title: David Baddiel - The Not The Trilogy
overview: All three of David Baddiel's universally critically acclaimed one-man shows will land on Sky Arts & NOW in November.  These first original stand-up commissions for Sky Arts will see My Family: Not the Sitcom premiere on Saturday 9 November, Fame: Not the Musical on 16 November and Trolls: Not the Dolls following on 23 November, all at 10pm on Sky Arts and available on NOW. Taped at London's iconic Royal Court Theatre earlier this year, David reprised the three critically acclaimed shows which saw him return to stand up (after 15 years away) and perform in the UK and internationally from 2013 - 2021.
